verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He walked where I walk (echo) He stood where I stood (echo) He felt what I feel (echo) He understands (echo){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He knows my frailty (echo) Shared my humanity (echo) Tempted in every way (echo) Yet without sin (echo){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God with us. So close to us. God with us Emmanuel (repeat) Emmanuel.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One of a hated race (echo) Stung by the prejudice (echo) Suffâ€™ring injustice (echo) Yet He forgives (echo) Wept for my wasted years (echo) Paid for my wickedness (echo) He died in my place (echo) That I might live.{/lang-eng}
